comments.body: We've been live since February but were adding some final touches before our bitcointalk thread - let us know your thoughts, we're always keen to build what the people want!Feel free to PM me your Shuffle username here and I'll give you $5 to try out the site for a more in-depth review. Valid for the first 50!

Good to see that you are here.What I really liked the most about shuffle is- the UI. It's pretty much cool. Feel free to DM me if you need any assistance. My telegram- @LT_Mouse

comments.body: Welcome to the forum!Just checked the website and I have to say it looks pretty impressive. The graphic images for original is eye catching and unique. Hope to see some action from you with some exclusive offers only for the forum. Best of Luck.

comments.author: piebeyb
comments.body: I think there is no problem when you introduce your current site and it is true what @LittleMouse said, even though it has been several months, there is no such thing as being late when it comes to promoting casino sites on this forum, at least you have prepared the best site for users here. When I try to open the site it loads quickly The UI looks attractive moreover it also works great on mobile browsers.I just registered with the site wanting to see some interesting things in it, it's also fun when there are some games that I often play like Limbo and Plinko, that's good because I don't like slot games at least there are alternative casino games that I will play here besides sports betting , in the deposit section as usual KYC verification level 1 and maybe some will not like this, Btw welcome to the forum maybe I will try the game here later if this site has a good response from the community always make sure you are active in this forum and just another suggestion run a signature campaign to get traffic on this forum

comments.author: Bitinity
comments.body: Your casino looks really cool, gives a good first impression to anyone who visited your site for the first time. Just registered an account and I got a welcome message from the live chat, surprised to know that you have over 10,000 registered players already. After checking the deposit, it seems that I have to pass KYC verification level 1 first in order to get the deposit address. To be frank, I dont like this but I have to say it is better than allowing people to deposit without KYC but asking people to do KYC on withdrawal. Welcome to the forum and wish the best luck for your casino, maybe I can try your casino with your free offer only since I think I wont be filling the KYC verification to make deposit.

comments.author: o48o
comments.body: I checked your policies from tos etc and everything looks legit so far. That platform token interests me. I am assuming i am "mining" it by gambling? Does the size of my airdrop depend on how much i gamble and on which games?Also it would be nice to read a whitepaper, or any paper about tokenomics and everything about it to make a decision if it's good enough reason to gamble in your casino before it launches.Site looks sleek, legit, it has fast response time and clear gui. I am intrigued, which is rare for me with new casinos.

Updates will be announced on our Twitter.Welcome to the forum and just as you have already been told by other members who already commented on this thread,  you have to work extra hard to promote and increase the visibility of your casino and since you already started that you just get started, I advise you to be more active here in the thread and also offers some incentive to forum members in form of bonuses to allow us to try out your casino and thereafter giving our honest reviews about its features. As you know, feedback is very important to a starter because that is where you get the best suggestions and areas where you fall short can also be identified.

comments.author: coin-investor
comments.body: Based on whois this is a bought domain Quotehttps://www.whois.com/whois/shuffle.comDomain:shuffle.comRegistrar:GoDaddy.com, LLCRegistered On:1996-07-31Expires On:2024-07-29Updated On:2023-07-31 No problem at all, It's understandable that they want to be competitive in a very competitive industry so you are launching your own token which is interesting I'm a fan of token-based casinos, and I have two of these I hope you can launch a marketing campaign and you have a plan to get your token in the market, both casino based token I'm holding right now are doing great in the market. The platform is good you have a Copper account and a good announcement design, OP did the right thing hopefully te next thing is the marketing.

Updates will be announced on our Twitter.Maybe you should stick to the subject if this is official Shuffle twitter account.I visited Shuffle twitter page and I found a lot of content and images unrelated with gambling or casinos, there are pizza images, alcohol, drinks, comical images, browsers, food, etc.Website design is fine looking but it reminds me a little on Sportsbet and Livecasino, is there any connection with this caisnos?

comments.author: Cantsay
comments.body: Yo we have another here, welcome to Bitcointalk.Copper member, Nice Ann thread, responding to comments and nice Web design that is a great start for you guys.  I just registered an account and tried out a few games and I couldn’t find one of my favourite which is “spin match” and your original games need some updating as having just a few games might bore bettors so do well to update it. Lastly, your domain name sounds nice.

comments.author: acroman08
comments.body: I just registered on your gambling site, regarding your registration, I saw on your ToS that you'll need to put a valid email address, name, date of birth, etc. on the registration form, but when you try to register it only asks you for username, email address and password, is that a mistake or not? that being said, after registering and going to the setting, the gambling does ask me to complete the KYC level 1.Welcome to the forum! if you don't know it yet and want to further advertise your gambling site here in the forum, we have something called a "Signature Campaign", if you are interested there are Campaign managers who are trusted and will run your campaign smoothly

comments.author: CryptSafe
comments.body: OP I must say your casino came  prepared to rendering good and quality services here. However, I will still join in welcoming you to this great platform as your presence is highly welcomed. Merely looking at your announcement thread here I noticed your profile is already upgraded to a copper member which would enable you upload   your graphics which you already did and it looks unique and with a touch of excellence. This attribute shows how good a manager or representative you are because you followed the rules of the platform in registering for a copper member as a casino.I had to check your website and my first observation was the cookies which i am  really not comfortable with. From the looks, one must accept it before it goes of from home screen  page which is not quite alright. It would be nice the cookies is made an option to reject or accept so as to enable a full home page accessibility. I barely see your minimum withdrawal and deposit. I will suggest it is made accessible for prospective members to see and know what is obtainable when registering. However you have a good casino with lots of features but you would have other big names to contend with here. I would advise you make provision for your publicity campaign to create much awareness of your casino here as it is known that campaign managed by well known reputable managers have the tendencies to last long here. Nevertheless, you can seek the expertise of a good, reliable and trustworthy campaign manager to help you manage your campaign. Royse777 can help deliver your campaign  as he has a vast knowledge and experience here with numerous recorded successful projects under his management.

comments.body: Welcome to Shuffle.com casinoAs @Bitinity said, can the 1st verification be removed so that all casino customers are more comfortable without the first verification to make a deposit.If it's like this then I assume that even withdrawals seem to require lvl 2 verification?Of course I love the design of this website. If you don't mind if I want to test this site with a bonus offer I will PM you.

comments.author: o48o
comments.body: Quote from: ndumm on September 04, 2023, 09:09:20 AMQuote from: o48o on September 04, 2023, 08:46:12 AMThat platform token interests me. I am assuming i am "mining" it by gambling? Does the size of my airdrop depend on how much i gamble and on which games?Also it would be nice to read a whitepaper, or any paper about tokenomics and everything about it to make a decision if it's good enough reason to gamble in your casino before it launches.More details will be released soon, it's safe to assume that your play on Shuffle will contribute directly to the size of your airdrop. Updates will be announced on our Twitter.Great, i am hoping it will have a reasonable use case and i am eager to know what it is. However i am doubtful as most of the tokens out there don't have reason to exist.And i don't have yet enough information that would justify a kyc and grinding slot machines for something that might have value, but years in this scene have made me cynical and odds are it's just another pointless token. Your site looks promising, so i keep my fingers crossed for you. But until i know the tokenomics and the use case for the token i am not gambling for airdrop.
